content: निष्क्रयः {@--1@} Redemption, ransom; ददौ दत्तं समुद्रेण पीतेनेवात्मनिष्क्रयं <ls>R. 15. 55</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 55</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 22</ls>; <ls>Mu. 6. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Reward. {@--3@} Hire, wages. {@--4@} Return, acquittance; <ls>Śi. 1. 50.</ls> {@--5@} Exchange, barter. {@--6@} Sale. {@--7@} Purchase.
